listing.listing_description:
Magnificent waterfront Villa Sul Mare is one of the most unique and architecturally significant homes in the prestigious gated community of Ocean Club Estates. Idyllically set amidst a lush acre of Paradise Island, it is an oasis of stately palms and natural flora.

The expansive fully air-conditioned minimalist design of Villa Sul Mare provides for clean and spacious holiday living, while the generous patios ensure you can take full advantage of outdoor living. Outside the great room on the harbor side is the opulent poolside terrace, furnished with plush upholstered seating for watching the kids play in the pool, catching up with your reading or simply taking a nap. A large table positioned under a roofed pergola offers you the perfect place to enjoy al fresco dining. This 3,000 square foot outdoor area, where you’ll easily spend most of your time, also has a grill, heated whirl pool spa, al fresco shower, a Ping-Pong table for family championships and a deck lined with comfy and cushioned chaise lounges. Inside the villa your extensive amenities include a bright, fully equipped kitchen, satellite television, DVD, Blu-ray and Wi-Fi. At Villa Sul Mare you can have all the luxury and comforts of home with the added bonus of this extra special waterfront location.

Villa Sul Mare houses six bedrooms under seven roofs: a unique floor plan that epitomizes casual island elegance. Four of the bedrooms have en-suites while the others share. The master bedroom includes a walk in closet and terraces both front and back with magnificent ocean views, it’s a wonderful place to wake up to.

Villa Sul Mare is situated on Paradise Island, inside the world renowned Ocean Club Estates. The fabulous amenties of Ocean Club Estates includes a private golf course and club house, 2 private tennis courts, a private beach club as well as a children's playground.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Refresh your spirits on one of the world’s best beaches at Villa Paprika. Set just steps from the famously clear waters of Grace Bay Beach, this luxury oceanfront Turks and Caicos estate is elegant yet welcoming, inviting you to relax on a grand scale. Well-appointed decks and terraces, refined interiors and five suite-style bedrooms mean you’ll hardly need to convince friends and family to join you at this beautiful Caribbean vacation rental.

An allée lined with tall coconut palms and flowering shrubs leads you to the front door of Villa Paprika. The tropical landscape continues on the ocean side, surrounding the coral-stone terrace for a private feel. Relish coffee and fresh fruit in the shade of the gazebo, sunbathe in the lounge chairs, swim in the large saltwater pool or help younger guests dip their feet in the children’s pool. A boardwalk leads down to several beach decks with lounge furniture and shade umbrellas, and there’s snorkeling equipment if you’d like to explore the reef just offshore. Rinse off in the outdoor shower before heating up the barbecue and sitting down to the al-fresco dining area in a loggia just off the house.

Creamy stone and paprika-toned shutters set a traditional tone for the villa that’s carried out inside by coffered ceilings, tile floors, carved wooden furniture and a blue and white color scheme. Several seating areas in the living room mean you can spend your holiday catching up or blissing out, and there’s both a formal dining area and a breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen. Of course, if you’d rather not cook, the villa is a short walk from restaurants, pubs and even a gelato place.

The five bedrooms at Villa Paprika are spread out over three floors; each has an en-suite bathroom, ocean views and at least one king bed. (Two bedrooms on the second and third floors each have two king beds.) The ground-floor bedroom opens directly to the pool terrace, while the upper-floor suites all open to balconies with lounge furniture, letting you breathe in the fresh ocean air first thing in the morning or step outside to relive your honeymoon with a little stargazing at night.

The villa’s location in the Turtle Cove area puts you at the quieter end of gorgeous Grace Bay. Not only is the beach directly in front of the house perfect for strolling and swimming, it’s also home to great snorkeling on Smith’s Reef. You can also book fishing excursions or semi-submarine rides at nearby Turtle Cove Marina, or walk to a variety of restaurants and cafes. Active guests have the choice of a nearby golf course, horseback riding, and bike and scooter rentals; for everyone else, it’s a short drive into town for unique shops and art galleries.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Take in the beauty of Turtle Cove on Providenciales from Avalon. Laid out around a resort-worthy infinity pool, the four-bedroom villa has stunning ocean views, luxurious amenities, and comfortable living spaces that are open to the sea breezes. Come with family or friends to enjoy gracious, hotel-style accommodations in a private setting.

The centerpiece of the house is a large infinity-edge swimming pool, complete with swim-up bar. It’s surrounded by a travertine pool deck, equipped with plenty of chaise longues and spots for outdoor dining. At one end is a gazebo with an outdoor kitchen with a gas grill, fridge and bar, plus speakers that connect to the home’s sound system. Inside, there’s a home theatre and DVD library, plus air conditioning to ensure your comfort.

Many of Avalon’s living spaces have walls of pocket doors that can be opened to turn the rooms into outdoor areas. In keeping with the breezy atmosphere, the decor is airy and light, featuring white walls, high ceilings, and wicker furniture, with blue accent cushions bringing the color of the sea inside. The open-air dining room has views of both the ocean and Turtle Cove Marina, making for lively meals. The indoor kitchen is equally bright and open, with white cabinets, stainless steel appliances and a spacious granite-topped central island.

Each of the property’s four bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom with shower, air conditioning, a ceiling fan, and a TV. There are three bedrooms with king beds and one bedroom with two queen beds. The master bedroom, which has a king bed, is located in its own private tower and opens to the pool terrace on one side and a private outdoor shower for two on the other.

Avalon has a very convenient location on the island of Providenciales. From the villa, it’s less than a minute on foot to the nearest beach on famed Grace Bay. By car, it’s a 3-minute drive to the closest restaurants, a 5-minute drive to the grocery store and a short trip to the international airport.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Views of turquoise water fill 80 feet of windows at this pared-down Miami Beach penthouse. The setting is spectacular, but the vibe is sophisticated, with neutral tones and luxe textures instead of over-the-top glamour. Take the elevator down from the villa’s perch atop the 1 Hotel and walk outside to the broad, sandy beach.

Sun and sip in private on the oceanfront balcony, which gives you a great view of all that’s happening on the beach. As a guest of 1 Hotel, you’re also welcome to splash around the swimming pools and stretch out in the fitness center.

Crystallized glass floors stretch out across the villa’s great room, linking the living area, dining area, and fully equipped kitchen. You’ll find the same attention to texture and detail throughout, from the quartz island and Italian silver travertine accents in the kitchen to the limestone slabs in the bathrooms. And the penthouse’s softer side is on display in pieces like faux-fur cushions and a live-edge coffee table.

With 4 pools and 600 feet of white-sand beach, the hotel has plenty of room for you to soak in the Florida sunshine. Reserve a cabana for privacy, order drinks to sip beachside, and, when you’re hungry, stop at one of 6 restaurants serving everything from farm-to-table specialties to Japanese-Peruvian fusion. Beyond the hotel, you’re a 3-minute walk from Collins Park and a 4-minute drive from downtown Miami Beach.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located on the sandy cove of Jamaica’s Discovery Bay, the Sundown Villa offers private beachfront, spacious indoor/outdoor lounge areas, and nine en-suite bedrooms for total accommodations of eighteen. Your large group will no worries while enjoying their beach vacation thanks to Sundown’s staff, which consists of chefs, butlers, housekeepers, and a water sports expert. During your stay, privacy is provided by Sundown’s lush tropical gardens, so you and your guests can enjoy Jamaica’s gorgeous beach environment in relaxing seclusion.

Sundown’s stately colonial design is shown off with exposed wood beams, high vaulted-ceilings, four-post beds, and wide openings to the ocean view and terrace. You’re sure to appreciate Sundown’s dynamic interior, rich with elegant decor and designer furniture, yet equal parts fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight, this villa is ready for any occasion. Sundown’s tech features include a home theatre, Bose stereo, Wi-Fi, and satellite televisions. The nine bedrooms are split, with five in the Main House, and four in the Guest House, which also features its own kitchenette.

At dinner, you’ll have to choose between the lavishly adorned dining room, or the ocean view alfresco set on the terrace, both are great choices. If you’re feeling more casual, there are plenty of sitting areas scattered throughout the gardens, terrace, and beach, all perfect for more intimate occasions. On the shore, you’ll find access to water sports equipment, beach loungers, and the calm waters created by Sundown’s private pier, which leads to the massage and yoga area. And, there’s a jungle gym on the lawn for children.

If you’d like to get out and explore more of Jamaica’s natural wonders, Green Grotto Caves, Dunn’s River Falls, and Dolphin Cove are great afternoon excursions. If there’s a golfer in your group, Runaway Bay is a gorgeous course, just under ten-kilometers from home. And, if you feel like a trip to the city, Montego Bay’s dining, shopping, and nightlife are just under an hour’s drive from your beachfront vacation home.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Beach Enclave - 5 Bedroom Beachfront is located along coveted International Drive, a prestigious cul-de-sac known for its designer homes. The area offers stunning views of Turks and Caicos’ North Shore, the protected Princess Alexandra National Park and the teeming barrier reef. This private neighborhood offers tranquility with low density and scant traffic. Right on the oceanfront of Babalua Beach and less than ten minutes from Grace Bay, you will be perfectly poised for the ultimate Caribbean holiday!

The combination of private beach access, easy and breezy living and magnificent views along with the vacation rental’s luxury services and management make this property a one-of-a-kind real estate opportunity in Providenciales. Beach Enclave - 5 Bedroom Beachfront is generously embedded in the lush, natural vegetation of the islands with less than one home per acre. Outdoor perks include a swimming pool, an alfresco dining area for ten, a barbeque, fire pit, an outdoor shower and plenty of sun loungers. The private beach area is accessible via a carved limestone staircase.

High ceilings and a predominantly white decorative scheme keep the feelings light and bright at this magnificent holiday home. Subtle wooden accents in the great room help keep the atmosphere balanced and grounded. Enjoy dinner at the formal dining table that is uniquely hewn to preserve the original shape and grains of the tree. The fully equipped kitchen features a breakfast bar and an espresso machine. Wi-Fi access is free.

The five stunning bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms accommodate up to ten guests at this non-smoking villa. The two master suites feature king size beds, dual vanities, alfresco showers and balconies. All of the suites offer television, ceiling fans and ocean views.

Don’t forget – group yoga sessions are included with your reservation. Get into that meditative state you’ve been craving for so long! You will also be within easy driving distance of the Provo Golf Club. We recommend this villa for a family vacation, a decadent honeymoon or couples’ retreat or a special event such as a wedding or anniversary. Have your vacation, your way with Luxury Retreats!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Little could be more invigorating than beach fun and tennis on the sunny island of Anguilla. Zenaida Estate offers both brilliant activities right at your fingertips! This resplendent villa is located in the coveted area of Sandy Hill and is nestled on three acres of lush tropical gardens with sweeping views of the Caribbean Sea and the mountains of St. Martin and St. Barths. Come get the rest and relaxation you deserve at this bijou villa!

Zenaida Beach and Tennis Estate comprises three pavilions – ‘Flamboyant,’ ‘Loblolly’ and ‘Garden Cottage.’ Enjoy a swim in the infinity pool overlooking the aquamarine and azure hues of the ocean. Zenaida Estate also offers the only Har-Tru soft tennis court in the Leeward Islands. The court is well lit for playing in the cool of the tropical nights. The pièce de résistance of Zenaida, however, is no doubt the mile stretch of Anguilla’s famous powder-white sand beach right in your backyard. When you step out of the ocean, an open air hot tub and a delightful BBQ area await your whims. Perhaps some alfresco dining tonight?

Asian antiques and chic contemporary furniture populate the interior spaces of Zenaida. The main living area features double-story ceilings and generous openings to the sea view. The gourmet kitchen features stainless steel appliances and a center island with a breakfast bar. Your reservation at Zenaida Estate includes a full staff with housekeeping, manager and security as well as complimentary continental breakfasts.

Seven immaculate bedrooms accommodate up to fourteen guests at Zenaida Estate. All of the bedrooms feature king beds, en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning. Fine linens and comfortable beddings provide splendid nights of rest. Wake up to crystal clear mornings and nothing but the sounds of ocean waves as your soundtrack!

With over 30 beaches, gourmet beachfront restaurants, a relaxed lifestyle and friendly people, Anguilla has become a renowned destination for the sophisticated traveler. Scuba diving, deep-sea fishing, wind surfing, sailing, horseback riding and world class spa facilities are all available within a few minutes of Zenaida Estate. Perfect for families, groups of friends or corporate retreats, come experience the laid back island tempo and warm hospitality that have made this area of the Caribbean so desirable.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The spectacular Casa Carey blends impressive architecture with natural beauty to achieve perfection in paradise. On the edge of the shimmering sea by a magnificent golf course this is a sumptuous villa in sought-after Punta Cana. Designed by the renowned Mexican architect Manolo Mestre, it sparkles with contemporary chic. Take the inviting steps into the sweeping arc of your azure swimming pool then gather for drinks among the palms and gaze out over the Atlantic as you allow the glorious Caribbean to do the rest.

Welcoming groups of up to 16, the glamorous Casa Carey will play a starring role in your luxury vacation. Greeted by your villa staff, you will be ushered along enticing pathways which build a sense of theater. These lead you into a magnificent property where comfort takes center stage. Set over three tiers it rewards you with stellar views of the sparkling sea. From this front row seat on the Dominican coast you can really enjoy your place in the sun.

Casa Carey is a beguiling mix of modernity and tradition. Thatched gazebos provide shady settings to dine al fresco  or imbibe the beautiful view. Inside the villa curving walls echo the flowing beach. They take you on a natural journey through rooms featuring inviting chairs and sofas and a delightful dining table. Exercise is catered for in a fully-equipped fitness center, billiards room and table tennis area. On sunny Caribbean days retire to the shady rooftop terrace and laze in a hammock. From here, as the curtain falls over another Dominican day, the views are magnificent.

Traditional wood furnishings and cool tiled floors lend extra opulence to Casa Carey’s luxurious bedrooms. Six spacious, airy rooms are spread over three floors with master suites on each level. These provide extra space to breathe with elegant terraces providing refreshing access to the great outdoors. Decorated in a rainbow of colors, five of the rooms boast en-suite bathrooms while the sixth is the perfect family bunk room for children. Massive king-sized beds, outdoor showers and a range of modern conveniences complete the restful, relaxing picture.

In the heart of the exclusive and elegant Punta Cana resort, Casa Carey gives you access to an unrivalled host of vacation activities. Spread over 26 acres of sun-baked countryside you can enjoy everything from kitesurfing to eco tours. Stroll along the flawless beaches at La Cana and Juanillo. Hit the fairways at Corales and Punta Espada. The dazzling sea also begs to be explored with scuba diving trips below the surface.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note that there is construction near this villa. Promotions may be available for your desired dates, please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details.

Overlooking the sparkling turquoise waters of the sea, little could compare to the sublime vibrations to be experienced at this bijou villa. This luxury residence is part of the illustrious Grace Bay Resorts, one of the first developers to discover this jewel destination on Turks and Caicos. Discerning travellers agree: after your stay at Villa Portofino, the Caribbean will simply never be the same!

Villa Portofino exemplifies luxury living in the Caribbean, with personal concierge service and micro resort amenities including a library and complete fitness center. The immaculately landscaped outdoor space was thoughtfully designed with true luxury in mind, from the infinity swimming pool, outdoor hot tub and palapa, to the decadent outdoor showers. You will also find a spacious deck with alfresco dining. Housekeeping is included and a babysitter, activities, spa services and a chef can be arranged for a nominal fee.

The interiors feature high vaulted ceilings that offer that quintessential Caribbean atmosphere. Furnishings are modern and plush. The open plan dining, kitchen and living area offers an easy and breezy feeling. With an established reputation for superlative service and innovation, enjoy the many amenities of Grace Bay: swimming pool, welcome drinks, pool and beach set up alongside complimentary daily American breakfasts, start-up bar and shuttle service.

The five fabulous bedrooms at Villa Portofino accommodate up to ten guests. Sea views reign supreme in each villa’s two oceanfront master bedrooms with terraces, while the fifth bedroom is located within a private, detached cottage. All of the bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms and televisions. Only the finest linens, bedding and accoutrements have been provided to help ensure soothing nights of rest. Wake up each new morning to the shining sun and glimmering sea!

In 2015, Grace Bay was awarded TripAdvisor’s coveted ‘Traveler’s Choice’ award for the top quality of its soft sands and clear waters. Nearby outdoor activities include kite surfing, snorkeling and scuba diving. Or try a scooter tour for a change of pace, possibly the best way to see a sunny island that’s only a few miles across. Nature lovers should be sure to check out Little Water Cay, a natural habitat full of friendly iguanas. You will also find the Provo Golf Club nearby, a top ranked eighteen-hole course. Have your vacation, your way with Luxury Retreats!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Located right on the edge of Marigot Bay in St. Bart’s, Eden House is a luxury vacation rental with its own private beachfront and direct access to the ocean. With three beautiful bedrooms, Eden House has accommodations for six, perfect for a family getaway, vacation with friends, or a romantic honeymoon.

Wake up to an amazing ocean view, make yourself an espresso, and then head down to the private beach. Relax in a lounge chair and watch the sun rise, and begin your day with a long dip in the ocean. At Eden House, it’s that easy. For lunch, an alfresco barbeque meal on the terrace, and then an afternoon swim in the infinity pool. For dinner, there is formal dining for eight, and after, there’s plenty of indoor and outdoor space for hosting an intimate beach house soiree.

Carefully selected bright accents direct guest’s attention to each area of the open concept design. A red coffee table between two plush couches signifies the living room, while gorgeous wooden cabinetry dictates the area for the kitchen. Straight lines, muted tones, and angular architecture open the interior space, keeping it bright and filled with fresh ocean breeze. The merging of indoor and outdoor space is a key element to the flow of the villa. With large openings across the entire terrace, it’s easy and exciting to blur those lines.

All of the bedrooms at Eden House feature king sized beds, ensuite bathrooms, dual vanities, Apple TV, and walk-in closets. The two bedrooms on the first floor have private terraces and ocean views, while the bedroom on the main floor features a garden view.

If you feel like a trip into the city, the nearby town of Gustavia is rich with fine dining, boutique shops, and vibrant nightlife. If you’re looking for an adventure, try hiking the Colombier Beach Trail, it leads to a secluded beach, only accessible by foot and boat.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Look out over the shimmering sea and St. Bart’s neighboring islands at this breezy beach house between St. Jean Beach and the village of Lorient. Work on your tan from a sunbed while the kids splash around in the infinity-edge swimming pool. Later, sit for an alfresco dinner on the terrace before heading out for a night of tropical cocktails and beachfront bars 10 minutes away in Gustavia.

Designed by the owner/architect, Ella was created to embrace St. Bart’s finest qualities. Extra-tall, exposed-beam ceilings sit atop wide openings to the terrace, inviting fresh sea breeze to flow freely within the interior. Soothing decor consisting of stone, wood, and shades of white illustrate the island’s laid-back attitude. Ocean-inspired, turquoise accent tiles remind guests of the incredible views, vantage points, and seaside sitting areas all over Ella’s multi-level terrace. While you’re outside, fire up the barbecue and grill up some fresh seafood from a local market.

Ella’s area of the island is packed full of pristine beachfront, with 6 of St. Bart’s best within a 10-minute drive. St. Jean Beach, with its white sand and crystal clear water, is especially perfect if you’d like to try snorkeling for the first time. After the beach, do a little shopping on the iconic Quai de la Republique, where you’ll find everything from international brand outlets to local upscale fashion houses.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Like a brilliant ivory sculpture hovering above a sparkling turquoise sea, you will find Villa Sol y Luna, a spectacular luxury retreat located in Ocean Point, Turks and Caicos. Located atop a short cliff along the majestic oceanfront, this vacation rental is located just a two minute walk from fabulous Taylor Bay Beach. Whether it’s time for the sun or moon to shine, this private villa has got you covered!

Enjoy a refreshing dip in the pristine waters of the infinity swimming pool—any time of day! You will also find a hot tub on the terrace, perfect for a midnight soak with your favorite cocktail in hand. Ideal for the consummate entertainer, other exterior perks at Villa Sol y Luna include a barbeque, a lovely alfresco dining set, a bar and a rooftop terrace. You will also find plenty of sun loungers, an alfresco shower and a lush garden. The interiors at Villa Sol y Luna provide a television, surround sound and Wi-Fi. Your reservation includes a mid-week cleaning service.

Kick back in the spacious living room with comfortable white seating and a television. The open plan includes a formal dining area with a glass table and a spectacular view of the sea. The adjacent fully equipped kitchen features a convenient and stylish breakfast bar.

Two exquisite bedrooms and a trundle bed accommodate up to six guests at this non-smoking villa. Both bedrooms offer en-suite bathrooms, televisions, ocean views and access to a private balcony overlooking the sea. The master suite provides a king size bed, dual vanity and jetted tub.

Whether for a family holiday or a decadent honeymoon, Villa Sol y Luna makes a great bet. You will also be within driving distance of iconic Grace Bay and the Provo Golf Club. Nearby outdoor activities include kite surfing, snorkeling and scuba diving. Or try a scooter tour for a change of pace, possibly the best way to see a sunny island that’s only a few miles across. Nature lovers should be sure to check out Little Water Cay, a natural habitat full of friendly iguanas. As you gaze at the brilliant turquoise waters of the sea, little could compare to the sublime vibrations to be experienced at this bijou villa!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Superior design, modern layout, and cutting-edge decor choices define this premier villa in Sint Maarten’s Indigo Bay. Set on a palm tree hillside overlooking the azure-blue Caribbean, the home offers huge living spaces, tastefully-divided gardens, and a spacious sun terrace. No expense has been spared with this property, with golden beaches, bars, cruise outings and Philipsburg town nearby.

An exceptional view awaits new arrivals that step into the central living space at Emeraude, with a shimmering sea framed by a blue pool, waving palm trees and artful pergola. Guests can expect designer furnishings, ranging from huge dining tables and specially-selected beds to the extras like the large piano and telescope. An interior forest walkway, stepping-stone water feature and fully-outfitted lounge bed add layers of innovative touches to this home, while private massage quarters and tree-shaded loungers help to top off the experience. The shining, fully-equipped kitchen ensures that catering for big groups is especially easy.

From Emeraude, guests are a short drive from picturesque shorelines, including the sandy Little Bay Beach and the famous “close-shave” airport approach at Maho Beach. A huge range of ocean outings are available from within minutes, including speed boat trips, scuba diving in crystalline waters, and relaxing yacht and catamaran trips. Visit local rum distilleries for a taste of the island’s unique culture, or take to the countryside on an exhilarating ATV outing. After strolling the colonial Dutch streets of the local town, retire to your private terrace for a cool drink and a glorious sunset.

For larger groups, Emeraude can be rented alongside a 2 bedroom apartment on the property, Emeraude Hideaway.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Turtle Nest’s vibrant tropical garden entry sets the stage for a specular Caribbean view. Set on a slight rise at the edge of Baie Lounge Beach, the villa delivers a mesmerizing panoramic vista painted in sapphire and turquoise. The island of Saba rises in front of you followed by Statia, Kitts and Nevis flowing into the western horizon. In the distance are ships, yachts and sailing boats. Planes quietly descend. It is pure entertainment, yet a serene oasis.

Stylish and contemporary, the architectural design takes advantage of the view and tropical atmosphere. Interiors and exterior spaces seamlessly flow inside to outside. Glass doors disappear into the walls. Sand color tiles flow throughout the house seamlessly connecting to the beach. Large covered terraces provide generous seating for dining and lounging.

At the shoreline, you are steps from the beach and the stunning infinity pool edging the sea. The expansive pool terrace is filled with oversized daybeds and loungers for total relaxing. The gazebo at ocean’s edge is a great place to gather with bar style seating, dining space and barbeque.

The open plan interiors harmoniously blend with the exteriors. The look is elegantly sleek yet comfortable; a beautiful mix of contemporary style with elegant old world Caribbean touches like the handcrafted shuttered doors and windows. The spacious formal living and dining area seamlessly connects with the beautiful modern, well equipped kitchen. A soothing color scheme blends cream, taupe, and white with pops of vibrant colors. High vaulted ceilings create an airy feel. For entertainment, choose a flat screen TV with Netflix, Wi-Fi or the outdoor sound system.

The four bedrooms are of equal size; two at each end of the main house, all with sea views. Two have private terraces. Spacious and serene, each room’s décor blends a neutral palette with vibrant art and accessories. Spa style bathrooms, in taupe and creamy tones, have walk in showers and designer accessories. One has an outdoor garden shower.

You are secluded, yet very close to amenities. You are steps from Baie Longue Beach. In 10 minute you reach the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, shops and galleries, historic buildings and the Creole Market. Drive 25 minutes to Grand Case and Philipsburg’s shopping haven. A mere 10 minutes to the international airport.

_ Please Note: Long Bay Beach may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns. For the best swimming renters are recommended to walk down the beach near the La Samanna resort where the waters are more protected.  _

From the hills to the sea to the sunset, it’s all within view at Zetes. A hillside perch gives this St. Barts vacation rental command of Lorient and St. Jean bays, as well as the neighboring islands of St. Martin and Anguilla. Invite a group of friends or the whole family to fill the villa’s four bedrooms and step into this postcard-worthy setting.

Your holiday at Zetes begins with an airport transfer upon arrival, and includes housekeeping, gardening and pool service. Spend lazy days watching the ocean from the swimming pool or the row of loungers on the deck, then heat up the barbecue and see if you can serve dinner in the gazebo perfectly timed to the sunset. After dark, an Apple TV and Wi-Fi are waiting to entertain.

Vaulted ceilings and glass walls make the villa’s great room a bright, airy haven from which to enjoy the views. Rich cocoa-toned leather is a subtle touch of luxury in both the sitting area and around the dining table for ten. There’s also a sleek, fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar, as well as a separate media room that can be closed off with glass doors.

Zetes has three bedrooms with king beds: two of them share a balcony with each other, and the third shares a balcony with the fourth bedroom, which has two twin beds. All four bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning.

While this Petite Saline property feels well removed from the everyday, it’s just a short drive from popular Lorient Beach and Saline Beach, where you can splash in the waves or relive your honeymoon with a stroll on the sand. For shopping and dining, make the 20-minute drive into the island’s charming capital, Gustavia.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Leafy tropical gardens frame ocean views—and screen the alfresco bathtub—at this breezy waterfront bungalow. The villa is laid out over 3 buildings, all tucked amid the trees along the water, and stone steps lead from the patio into the lagoon for private swimming access. Walk across the grounds to the beach at GoldenEye Resort to borrow a kayak, paddleboard, or snorkeling gear or have a drink. 

Your holiday at this vacation rental includes nightly turndown, as well as housekeeper and butler service. Let your mind wander as you stretch out in the hammock or a lounger on the sunny terrace, or heat up the charcoal barbecue and serve fresh fare to family and friends at an alfresco table for 10. After dark, an Apple TV, Sonos sound system, and Wi-Fi are there to entertain. 

Follow palm-shaded paths from one building to the next, and open the louvered shutters to fill the rooms with warm island breezes. The living area is simple yet stylish, with whitewashed stone walls, blond-wood ceilings, and a woven area rug as the backdrop to playfully printed cushions on the sofa. There’s also a kitchenette with a stove available. 

Each of the 3 bedrooms is a honeymoon-worthy study in laid-back luxury. The master, set in the same building as the living room, has a king bed; the other 2, set in their own buildings, have queen beds. All 3 bedrooms have private ensuite bathrooms, some with an outdoor shower or tub, and air conditioning. 

While you can swim just off the villa’s stone terrace, you can also walk to the GoldenEye Resort beach to take a dip or borrow a kayak, stand-up paddleboard, or snorkeling equipment. Dine on Jamaican barbecue at the rum bar right on the beach or sit down to more local specialties in the open-air restaurant. If you like to explore, a stay in the Oracabessa area is close enough for a day trip to Ocho Rios and Dunn’s River Falls. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Nestled in luxurious gardens with spectacular views, Eden is a magnificent five-bedroom colonial style villa and cottage that is the embodiment of luxury and subtle refinement.   Located in the secure and exclusive Sugar Hill Lifestyle Development, this holiday villa for rent boasts a fabulous interior design and provides spacious luxury accommodation and the best of outdoor living.

Eden’s magnificent entrance features a sweeping marble staircase that leads on to an elegant living space equipped with an entertainment center. Three sets of doors open up from the living space onto a large covered terrace with spectacular views of the tropical gardens, salt water pool and the Caribbean Sea. This terrace offers a sizeable seating and dining area that can entertain up to twelve persons. Overlooking the pool is a gazebo, where guests can enjoy refreshing aperitifs and relaxed alfresco dining.

All bedrooms are beautifully furnished, and air conditioned each with its own spacious marble en-suite bathroom. A short walk across the pool deck is the self-contained cottage consisting of a large kitchen, en-suite bedroom and a dual-aspect media room with doors that open onto its own garden and outdoor seating area.

Guests of Eden enjoy exclusive access to Sugar Hill’s Clubhouse and facilities which offer a modern fully equipped air conditioned exercise room, 2000 square feet communal pool, restaurant, and four flood-lit, all-weather tennis courts. Guests also benefit from membership to the prestigious Royal Pavilion Beach Club, which is a five-minute drive from Sugar Hill. Facilities include complimentary towels, beach chairs and umbrellas together with a snack bar. Water sports are also available.

Eden has a core team of well-trained, talented and friendly staff which include a Butler, Cook and a Housekeeper, who are flexible to accommodate your needs, ensuring that your stay is relaxing. Eden also has a dedicated Villa Manager, who can offer advice and help with any other requests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Find your own piece of tropical paradise in a convenient location at Aqueous. After just a 20-minute drive from the airport, you can be at this fabulous Turks and Caicos vacation rental, looking out at the ocean. Spend your holiday laying on the beach with friends and family—there’s a beautiful one within walking distance—or reserve the villa for a honeymoon-style escape to the Caribbean.

This luxury property opens to a sunny terrace with a swimming pool and a row of loungers, plus a shaded area with al-fresco living and dining areas and a barbecue. Serve up dinner hot off the grill, then relax inside by the smart TV, Sonos sound system and Wi-Fi. For your comfort and convenience, the villa has air conditioning, a security system and laundry facilities.

Slide open the glass walls from the terrace to step into the L-shaped great room. This open-concept space features an inviting sitting area with a plump sectional, a dining table that seats eight and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. The room is bright and breezy, thanks to both the glass walls and a double-height section of ceiling.

Each of the three bedrooms at Aqueous has a king bed, a private en-suite bedroom, a smart TV, a Sonos sound system and, for the warmest tropical nights, air conditioning. Neutral tones and large windows make the bedrooms just as airy as the great room.

With the nearest beach just a 4-minute walk from the villa, it’s easy to pop over for a swim and return for coffee or a snack. The property’s location in the exclusive Sunset Beach Villas enclave also puts you a 5-minute drive or less from top-rated Grace Bay Beach, the restaurants and shops along Grace Bay, Provo Golf Club, Blue Haven Marina and the Leeward Settlement Market.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Clémentine villa is located on the hillside of Vitet, overlooking Lorient Bay while offering a wide view towards Saint Martin. The island of Saint Barts has earned its reputation for being luxurious and exclusive. The beaches are secluded, the water is warm and the landscape is composed of beautiful hills and ravines. With a distinct French influence, the island is sophisticated, yet laid back. The people of St. Barts take great pride in providing comfort, quiet and security to their visitors. Enjoy this escape with Luxury Retreats!

The grounds of this stunning vacation rental feature a swimming pool flanked by padded sun loungers and palm trees swaying in the wind. Climb the stairs to the covered alfresco dining area and lounge. There’s also a second outdoor lounge with a hanging chair and a sun bed. Inside this private holiday home, you will find a Nespresso machine, ice maker, Wi-Fi, desk and satellite television. There’s also an exercise room to stay on top of your workouts. Your reservation includes housekeeping.

The contemporary interiors of Clémentine showcase high ceilings, stylish furnishings and exquisite lighting fixtures. The white and bright open plan space includes a sleek set of couches and a large flat screen television. Behind it, the fully equipped kitchen offers a center island with a long breakfast bar. Two bedrooms include high vaulted ceilings, adding a quintessentially Caribbean motif.

In total, three bedrooms with queen size beds and en-suite bathrooms accommodate up to six guests at this non-smoking villa. Each bedroom provides a dual vanity, dressing area, lounge, ceiling fan and direct access to terrace and spectacular ocean views. We recommend this villa for a family reunion, a couples’ getaway or a special event like a wedding, birthday or anniversary.

Stone fences crisscross the steep slopes of Morne du Vitet, one of many mountains on St. Barts, along a rocky shore that resembles the rugged coast of Normandy. There is plenty of opportunity for fun and adventure, from volleyball to tennis and water skiing. In Gustavia, St. Barts’ tiny and relaxed capital city, you will discover red roofed buildings that pop through the lush tropical landscape, and all the historical sites can be seen over the course of a leisurely day. There is a little something for everyone on the tropical paradise of Saint Barts!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Named after its unique architecture of winged rooflines, this new villa offers dramatic views over the St. Jean Bay and is one of our top St. Barts vacation rentals for a group of friends travelling together. You will fall in love with the unspoiled tropical island of St Barts with its intimate and relaxed atmosphere and its abundance of white sand beaches.

There’s plenty of places to relax on the multi-leveled terrace. The upper level features comfy lounge chaises, exquisite ocean views and an infinity-edge pool. A separate plunge pool sits on the lower deck that also includes an open-air seating area with plush furnishings. Extra amenities include an exercise room, manicured outdoor gardens, gas barbecue and a daily maid service (except Sundays and holidays).

The interior of this multi-leveled home is done in soothing neutral tones with a variety of plants and light wood furnishings that give it an overall Zen-like ambiance. Many walls also fully open up to the terrace, and the living room offers plush seating and views of the water. Whip up an island-inspired meal in the spacious gourmet kitchen that includes a wine cellar, granite countertops and large and small appliances.

The villa’s four bedrooms can sleep up to eight guests—each features air conditioning, a flatscreen television, an en-suite bathroom and ocean views. As an added touch, each suite has been uniquely decorated with a different, playful color palette. Three rooms offer queen-sized beds while the remaining suite has two twin beds that can convert into a queen, as well as a walk-out to the terrace.

Located within a five minute drive to the popular St. Jean beach, you’re sure to get in plenty of surf and sand. A 3.8 km drive brings you to the town of Gustavia where you’ll discover a picturesque harbor, boutique shopping and world-class restaurants.

Overlooking the sparkling turquoise waters of the sea, little could compare to the sublime vibrations to be experienced at this bijou villa. This luxury residence is part of the illustrious Grace Bay Resorts, one of the first developers to discover this jewel destination on Turks and Caicos. Discerning travelers agree: after your stay at Graceful Living, the Caribbean will simply never be the same!

Graceful Living exemplifies luxury living in the Caribbean, with personal concierge service and micro resort amenities including a library and complete exercise room. The immaculately landscaped outdoor space was thoughtfully designed with true luxury in mind, from the infinity swimming pool, outdoor hot tub and palapa, to the decadent outdoor showers. You will also find a spacious deck with alfresco dining. Housekeeping is included and a babysitter, activities, spa services and a chef can be arranged for a nominal fee.

The interiors feature high vaulted ceilings that offer that quintessential Caribbean atmosphere. Furnishings are modern and plush. The open plan dining, kitchen and living area offers an easy and breezy feeling. With an established reputation for superlative service and innovation, enjoy the many amenities of Grace Bay: swimming pool, welcome drinks, pool and beach set up alongside complimentary daily American breakfasts, start-up bar and shuttle service.

The five fabulous bedrooms at Graceful Living accommodate up to ten guests. Sea views reign supreme in each villa’s two oceanfront master bedrooms with terraces, while the fifth bedroom is located within a private, detached cottage. All of the bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms and televisions. Only the finest linens, bedding and accoutrements have been provided to help ensure soothing nights of rest. Wake up each new morning to the shining sun and glimmering sea!

In 2015, Grace Bay was awarded TripAdvisor’s coveted ‘Traveler’s Choice’ award for the top quality of its soft sands and clear waters. Nearby outdoor activities include kite surfing, snorkeling and scuba diving. Or try a scooter tour for a change of pace, possibly the best way to see a sunny island that’s only a few miles across. Nature lovers should be sure to check out Little Water Cay, a natural habitat full of friendly iguanas. You will also find the Provo Golf Club nearby, a top ranked eighteen-hole course. Have your vacation, your way with Luxury Retreats!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located within walking distance to three of Jamaica’s most beautiful beaches, this oceanfront home is the perfect destination for those in search of a secluded Caribbean getaway. With three en-suite bedrooms, all featuring king beds and ocean views, Sea Biscuit is great for a couples retreat or vacation with friends, as well as a honeymoon with a little extra space. The Hermosa Cove area has been a favorite destination for Hollywood's elite ever since it was popularized by the likes of Marylin Monroe and Joan Collins in the nineteen-fifties. Nearby, you’ll find the quaint village of Ocho Rios, plenty of beachfront, and more.

Decorated to embrace its natural surroundings, Sea Biscuit utilized the color palette of the Caribbean to create a space that is both fun and formal. White-washed walls provide elegance to spaces like the formal dining area and living room while allowing contrasting colors and wood tones to pop with excitement. In the kitchen, you’ll appreciate the state of the art appliances and a bright, functional working space.

Sea Biscuit’s oceanfront terrace is likely where you’ll spend most of your time, sipping cocktails in the gazebo, enjoying scenic alfresco dinners, and cooling off in the refreshing plunge pool. The multiple furnished living areas outside make it easy for the whole group to gather as one, or break away for more intimate moments. If you’d prefer the comfort of the air conditioning inside, retreat to the living room and enjoy the villa’s Wi-Fi, streaming television, and Sonos sound system. And, to make your stay even more relaxing, Sea Biscuit comes with a housekeeper, butler, continental breakfast, and laundry service.

The nearest beach to home is Hermosa Cove, just one minute’s walk from Sea Biscuit. Travel a few minutes further and you’ll find yourself on the sandy shores Mahogany or Sandals Ochi beaches. If you’re traveling with kids or the young at heart, Dolphin Cove is the perfect place to interact with the Caribbean’s most friendly sea critters. And, for dining, shopping, and nightlife, Ocho Rios is just a few minutes drive from the turquoise shores of villa Sea Biscuit.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Stay within walking distance of the city’s most sought-after attractions at this eco-friendly luxury hotel on Miami Beach. Enjoy a light breakfast and espresso while looking out over the city, and then head down and follow the boardwalk to Miami Beach. For lunch, head to Espanola Way, Miami’s Spanish District, for a wealth of seafood options and colonial architecture.

Pristine whites and calming wood tones create a relaxing environment within this Collins Avenue suit. Open-concept design means you’ll be able to see that city view from every part of the living/dining room. In the kitchen, let your inner chef run wild and see if you can find a new, local dish to try out when dining in. Follow dinner with cocktails in the small sitting area on the balcony.

Treat yourself to an afternoon at the hotel's award winning spa, which offers a variety of therapeutic treatments, a steam room, and sauna. If you’re not ready to abandon your fitness routine, the building boasts an enormous gym with everything you’ll need to keep up. After a workout, cool off in one of 4 outdoor pools. And, try out all 4 on-site restaurants for a variety of cuisine by local celebrity chefs.

After you’ve spent some time exploring South Beach, caught a few waves, and had a frozen cocktail in the sand, head inland to check out the downtown core. If you’re into fashion, Mary Brickell Village and Lincoln Road Mall are beautiful outdoor pedestrian malls.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Steps from Miami Beach, you’ll have no trouble popping in and out of the sand from this contemporary ocean-view suite at The Setai. Feel the fresh sea breeze rolling off the Atlantic each morning while you sip Nespresso on the balcony. Before you head to the beach, check out the 5-star amenities at the hotel. Drive 8-miles inland for World-class seafood, dance clubs, and outdoor shopping malls.  

A full-wall of ocean-facing glass lets you set the perfect mood for any occasion. Feel like cozying up on the sofa for a movie? Close the dark blinds to create a theatre-like atmosphere for a romantic night in. Having guests for dinner, show off your endless view from every section of the open-concept living/dining room. In the kitchen, you’ll find teak cabinetry and stainless steel appliances.

There’s plenty of opportunity for physical activity in Miami Beach, so don’t worry about abandoning your daily routines. The Setai offers a fully-equipped kitchen center and swimming pool. After, rejuvenate with a dip in the hot tub. Then, treat yourself to an Asian-inspired dinner at their in-house restaurant, Jaya. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
A dramatic, winding hillside road delivers you to Terrasse de Mer, set high above the beach and civilization. It’s an exotic and private oasis. The moment you enter the large courtyard; you are in the midst of a stunning 360-degree view. Behind you are neighboring mountains; in front of you is Anguilla, so close you can touch it. Enter the front door and a brilliant, variegated scene flows before you, painted in greens and blues. Within your scope are the verdant island peaks, Baie Rouge Beach and Marigot with its poetic marinas. The sightline stretches to Creole Rock in Grand Case and beyond to the Atlantic’s horizon. The sapphire sea is everywhere.

Expansive terraces and covered spaces, for dining and lounging, surround the beautiful heated pool perched at the terrace’s edge. The natural vistas from the pool create a secluded atmosphere. A wall of sea side columns anchors the view and frames Anguilla. Parallel to Anguilla, above Baie Rouge Beach, is a long terrace with two gazebos, each with sliding glass doors; one with a hot tub.

The spacious main living area, featuring new furniture, is comfortable and stylish. The view is amazing! The décor throughout the interior has a romantic, elegant attitude in white, cream and Indonesian teak accented with charming exotic accessories. Just off the main room, the inviting French county kitchen looks out to the sea connecting the chef to nature. Dine inside off the terrace or at the high kitchen counter.

The four bedrooms with en suite bathrooms are equal size and air conditioned. Two are connected to the main house. One is off the terrace and the other in a private casita off the courtyard. The bathrooms are spacious with garden or sea views.

You are secluded yet close to amenities. In 10 minute you reach the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, shops and galleries, historic buildings and the Creole Market. Drive 25 minutes to Grand Case, 10 minutes to the international airport and 30 minutes to Philipsburg's shopping haven.

listing.listing_description:
This oceanfront property is great for family vacations, located in the gated community of The Lagoons in Montego Bay. Lush greenery surrounds the beachy 2-storey villa, with large windows, hardwood floors, and pops of colour found inside. Grab the snorkelling equipment and head out for a vibrant peek at underwater marine life before hopping in a kayak and paddling along the flourishing coastline. 

Gently rolling waves are a soothing sound to sip your morning coffee with. French doors open onto the verandah, expanding the living area and providing a shady spot to relax with a book while catching a Caribbean breeze. An infinity pool, with tanning ledge, seemingly melts into the glittering horizon. Your own in-house cook is provided, as well as a butler, gardener, and daily housekeeping. Follow a stone staircase down to the beach to find tiki torches lighting an alfresco dining table set into the sand; a picture-perfect way to savour fresh fare. 

The kids will never complain about boredom—a playground is steps away, stand up paddle boards, and plenty of yard space to run around in. Spend an evening at the local Hard Rock Cafe tasting American dishes with a twist while listening to live Jamaican jazz. Dramatic sunset cruises, reef snorkelling trips, and private beach party bookings are all included. Shared palm-lined tennis courts at the Lagoon Complex are steps away and your pick of golf clubs are within driving distance. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
What was once the finest lookout in Jamaica can be the view from your veranda at Fortlands Point on Discovery Bay. Though it’s named for the military installation that once sat nearby, this luxury vacation rental now only has strategic value when it comes to planning a beachfront Caribbean holiday with a group of family or friends.

Whether you want to watch boats ply the bay, dip your feet in the water or get out to kayak or snorkel, the choice is yours on the villa’s three private beaches. On land, the property’s amenities range from a pool, al-fresco sitting and dining areas to an indoor fitness center, television and Wi-Fi. Your stay at Fortlands Point also includes the services of a cook, butlers and housekeeper.

Stone walls and wide verandas give the villa a charming ambience that nods to the history of its location. Polished wood floors and palm-print area rugs are traditional touches that lend a sense of tropical elegance. More modern features such as fold-away glass doors let you open the spacious living and dining areas to the breezes off the bay, and high ceilings add to the airy feel.

Fortlands Point has five bedrooms with king beds, including one that is wheelchair accessible, and two bedrooms with two twin beds each, including a children’s loft. All seven bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning.

From the villa’s beachfront location on Discovery Bay, it’s a 13-minute drive to the nearest golf course and 60 minutes to the airport. If you can’t get enough beach time, there are several other sandy stretches in the area where you can relive your honeymoon with a stroll or go for a swim. If you’d like to learn more about the area’s history, visit the open-air museum at Columbus Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Relax on your own stretch of world-famous beach at Sunsara. Set on the white sands and turquoise waters of Grace Bay Beach in the exclusive community of Leeward, the recently remodeled four-bedroom villa is a private hideaway in a gorgeous location. It’s the perfect place to get away from it all, but shopping, dining, golf and tennis are just a short drive away, too.

Sunsara opens to a terrace with sitting and dining areas and a large freshwater pool surrounded by chaise longues and a hammock. A stroll across the lush lawn brings you to a waterfront deck and a 100-foot stretch of beach. Stay safe in the water with the provided flotation devices, rinse off after a swim in the outdoor shower, have a game on the lawn with the croquet set, prep local seafood on the barbecue and enjoy cocktails in the air-conditioned bar area with iPod sync. For the evenings, the villa has indoor and outdoor televisions, a sound system, board games, Wi-Fi access and air conditioning.

The interiors of Sunsara are contemporary and neutral, with ocean-inspired shades of sandy beige upholstery, turquoise accents and dark wood furniture in the open-plan living and dining areas. Floor-to-ceiling sliding glass doors mean the living spaces can be opened to the outdoors. The fully equipped kitchen has a breakfast bar, minimalist flat-front cabinets and sleek stainless steel appliances.

Each of the villa’s four bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom with shower and tub, air conditioning, a sitting area and blackout blinds for a restful sleep. The master bedroom has a king bed, ceiling fans, walk-in closet and opens to the terrace. A second bedroom has a queen bed, private entrance, garden view and terrace access, and the third bedroom has a queen bed and an ocean view.

Guests of Sunsara have direct access to Grace Bay Beach. From the villa, it’s a 3-minute drive to Turks & Caicos Golf and 3 miles to the grocery store, restaurants, shopping and nightlife in Grace Bay, as well as Princess Alexandra National Park. It’s about 6 miles to Turks & Caicos Island Tennis Club, 9 miles to the airport, 10 miles to Providenciales and 12 miles to Cheshire Hall. If you’d like to explore the island’s other beaches, Long Bay Beach is about 4 miles away and Coral Gardens Reef is 5 miles away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Set on nearly two acres of lush tropical grounds this beautifully decorated and spacious Colonial-style villa is one of our top villas in Barbados. Known as “Little England,” the island of Barbados combines British charm and Caribbean flair and offers plenty of sun, tranquil waters and vibrant nightlife. Built for a U.S. Ambassador over 50 years ago, the timeless good taste this property offers is hard to find in more recent properties. The surrounding gardens reflect the sure touch of the original designer and have matured to become some of the best on the island.

Chat with loved ones on the plush patio furnishings out on the property’s covered terrace. If you grow warm, head into the Italian, mosaic-tiled swimming pool that sits in the center of beautifully manicured grounds, looking towards the sea. Later, enjoy an alfresco meal on the large dining table, with seating for up to 18, then take in a sunset on the far end of the lawn in the Chinese gazebo that also has seating for up to 14 and features a wet bar and fridge.

The airy living room features mainly white furnishings, soaring 14-foot ceilings, and walks directly out onto the terrace. You won’t need to lift a finger during your stay, let the villa’s chef take care of the meals and the housekeeping staff ensure the place stays tidy.

The main home features five well-appointed bedrooms complete with high- quality furnishings and linens. All the rooms in the main house include air conditioning, private en-suite bathrooms, and a television with a DVD player. An additional bedroom with air conditioning and an en-suite is located in the separate cottage. The final rooms are found in the self-contained Chattel houses.

Located just around a half mile to the Cobblers Cove beach, you can enjoy safe swimming in the roped off area where you’ll discover excellent snorkeling opportunities. A five-minute drive brings you to Speightstown where you can shop and dine in elegant destinations.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Life’s a breeze when you’re on holiday at the beautiful Beach Garden. Set close to the water near Great Cruz Bay, this unique St. John vacation rental offers stunning waterfront living spaces, not to mention an unforgettable al-fresco shower. In spite of its quiet location and private feel, it’s also just minutes from shopping, dining and the beach.

Watch the sun sparkle on the water from an expansive terrace with outdoor living and dining areas and an infinity pool, or pause for reflection by the koi pond or in the meditation garden. After the sun goes down, watch the stars come out from the hot tub on the terrace, settle in by the satellite television or share snaps of the day via Wi-Fi.

The villa’s impressive stonework and refined furnishings set it apart from other Caribbean estates. The house is centered around an open-concept great room with a high ceiling and rows of doors on both sides. Its living and dining areas are chic yet comfortable, and the kitchen is fully equipped. To ensure your comfort, the rooms are also air conditioned.

The four bedrooms at this luxury property can accommodate groups of up to eight friends or extended family. All four have king beds, en-suite bathrooms, and their own balconies or gardens. Two of the bedrooms face the ocean, including one with a screened-in outdoor shower facing the bay, and the others face the courtyard.

Beach Garden is just a 5-minute drive from town, where you can browse for souvenirs, dine out or arrange an excursion at a dive center, and a 6.4 km drive from the beach, where you’ll find locals along with couples on honeymoon just soaking in the scenery.

listing.listing_description:
Set amongst lush tropical gardens alongside one of Sandy Lane’s three highly coveted golf courses, Klairan is the perfect villa for a secluded family getaway or a golf trip with friends. You’ll have quick and easy access to Sandy Lane Beach, one of the World’s most exclusive beachfront areas, which is just five minutes from home. Klairan’s four en-suite bedrooms, spacious interiors, and beautiful outdoor areas make it an unforgettable setting on your next Luxury Retreats vacation in Barbados.

Stately and elegant, villa Klairan wears its colonial heritage on its sleeve. From the decking on the terrace to the peaks of the exposed-ceilings, everything is white-washed, creating the perfect contrast for ocean-inspired splashes of turquoise and the vibrant tropical gardens that surround the villa. An open-air floorplan ensures to the free-flow of guests, sea breeze, and natural sunlight, moving in and out barrier-free. Spaces like the gazebo, koi pond, and swimming pool feel as just as comfortable as the living room and kitchen thanks to the open-plan design and private atmosphere.

Klairan comes with formal and alfresco dining settings, as well as a fully equipped kitchen and a barbecue on the terrace. All four bedrooms have air conditioning and en-suite bathrooms. And, you’ll surely appreciate Wi-Fi, cable television, an office space, and helpful staff during your stay.

With Sandy Lane Beach just five minutes from home, you won’t have to go far to enjoy a day on one of the most beautiful beaches on the island. However, if you feel like exploring, you’ll find Paynes Bay, Colony Club, Batts Rock, and several more sandy beaches, all under ten kilometers from Klairan. For a night out, Holetown is home to a vibrant bar, restaurant, and dance club scene, with plenty of great places to check out on First and Second streets. And, if it’s golf you’re after, Sandy Lane’s Old Nine course is a classic, and Country Club and Green Monkey have both won numerous awards for their creator, PGA Legend Tom Fazio.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Settle into laid-back island living at Whispering Waters on Discovery Bay. Everything about this oceanfront vacation rental in Jamaica, from its private beach and range of amenities to its vibrant decor, is designed to relax and rejuvenate. There’s even a full staff to ensure that you and up to fourteen friends or family members can enjoy the picture-perfect setting and seven-bedroom house with total ease.

Whispering Waters has all the amenities of a boutique hotel, from a pool and hot tub overlooking the private white-sand beach to a lit tennis court, kayaks and snorkeling gear. Let the chef, assistant chef, two butlers and housekeeper worry about the details; all you have to do is sit down to dinner at the al-fresco table. For your comfort and convenience, the house also has Wi-Fi, an air-conditioned exercise room and available baby equipment.

The villa’s lush surroundings are reflected in the vibrant hues and palm prints of the tropical-inspired interiors. When you’re not sitting out on the wide veranda, open the French doors to let the warm breeze flow through the living and dining rooms.

This luxury property has five bedrooms with king beds, including the master suite, and two bedrooms with two double beds each. All seven bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning, and several have access to a terrace or balcony along with views over the bay.

The Discovery Bay location of Whispering Waters puts you in a honeymoon-worthy spot on the water and just minutes from shopping, dining and attractions such as Columbus Park and the Green Grotto Caves. If you’ll be on holiday with a larger group, consider booking Keela Wee, the villa just next door with six bedrooms of its own.

listing.listing_description:
Ease into the rhythm of the tides at the beautiful ocean-view Belharra. Set in the hills of Gouverneur, this gorgeous modern vacation rental looks out over Gustavia, Colombier and miles of blue water stretching to the horizon. Luxury amenities, airy interiors and two suite-style bedrooms will help you—and up to four friends or family—to relax.

You’ll have no trouble adapting to the slower pace of life on St. Barts at Belharra. Start the morning with a selection from the villa’s coffee machine, sipped at the sitting area on the deck overlooking the harbor. From there, shift to a lounger in the sun or shade, or take a dip in the infinity pool. Get out your camera to capture the sunset views over Gustavia, then heat up the barbecue and linger around the al-fresco dining area into the evening.

Several sets of sliding glass doors connect the villa’s open-plan great room to the deck, so you can enjoy the ocean views from the living area, formal dining area and fully equipped kitchen. The furnishings are contemporary and the vibe is casual and beachy, thanks to warm wood tables and bookshelves, and bright blue accent pillows and vases. A breakfast bar in the kitchen is perfect for a casual meal or a pick-me-up before heading out to the beach.

The two bedrooms at Belharra are on the second floor and open to an upper-level, pergola-covered deck with its own lounge furniture and ocean views. Both bedrooms have queen beds and private en-suite bathrooms, as well as vaulted, whitewashed ceilings in classic Caribbean style.

Though it became famous as the island where the jet set goes on holiday, St. Barts is wonderful for a stylish beach vacation, romantic escape or honeymoon away from it all. Discover its charms at Flamands Beach, a long stretch of sand only 10 minutes from the villa, or in the upscale boutiques and fine restaurants of downtown Gustavia, equally close by.
